title: Break forth, O beauteous heavenly light
composer:
Johann Schop, 1641;
arr. J. S. Bach, 1734
poet: Johann Rist, 1641, tr. John Troutbeck ca. 1885
lyrics:
Break forth, O beauteous heav'nly light, and usher in the morning.
O shepherds, shrink not with affright, but hear the angel's warning.
This child, now weak in infancy, our confidence and joy shall be,
the power of Satan breaking, our peace eternal making.
